Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting DetailsI saw them from my driveway,ran into the house and got my video camera and filmed the best i could while holding a child and standing on a hot driveway with no shoes on.I have the objects on film which also has my children recorded on it. I am more than willing to let someone take the u.f.o. section off my video tape. My oldest son at the time also watched it with me, he was 6 at the time.The objects stayed still for a long time than moved slowly but two stayed the same distance apart and the third took off and came back in the distance.I have always been afraid to tell anyone until I saw a u.f.o. program on t.v. 1-19 08 on our cable t.v. station.People said i was nuts when i told them even when i showed the video. So i kept is quiet all this time but have been dyind to share it with someone who would show concern.I dont know how to put the video clip on the net. Please feel free to contact me.
trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Chico
There were no other sightings in Chico on or around March 17th 1996
